achievements.title: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon
achievements.description: Won the AWS for Startups prize for creating a multimodal AI assistant that automates browser tasks on behalf of users.
reference_context: AICamp Generative AI Hackathon for AI Agent and RAG

achievements.title: Optimized System Scalability
achievements.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, enhancing system scalability and database efficiency.

achievements.title: Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment Module
achievements.description: Customized 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records, reducing execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports containing customer data for over 6 months.

achievements.title: Engineered a Distributed System for Video to MP3 Conversion
achievements.description: Developed a microservices architecture for converting video files to MP3 format, implementing secure JWT user authentication, message queuing with RabbitMQ, scalable storage, and notifications.

achievements.title: Apache Kafka Producers/Consumers Implementation
achievements.description: Implemented Apache Kafka producers/consumers using Confluent Cloud with topic management, data serialization, and containerized an environment demonstrating cross-platform compatibility.

achievements.title: Full-stack Task Manager Web Application
achievements.description: Developed a full-stack task manager webapp with CRUD operations using React and Go, implemented GraphQL API for efficient data retrieval, and deployed on AWS with a self-signed SSL certificate for HTTPS.

achievements.title: AI-powered Voice Interviewer
achievements.description: Engineered an AI-powered voice interviewer application leveraging Groq for fast inference and Vapi for voice interactions, including a custom evaluation system utilizing Supabase for authentication and storage.
